official-title.#text:
To require the Comptroller General of the United States
		  to submit a report to Congress on the effectiveness of the Federal
		  Communications Commission’s universal service reforms.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S774 IS: To require the Comptroller General of the United States to submit a report to Congress on the effectiveness of the Federal Communications Commission’s universal service reforms.
